mapper.select: SELECT a.device_id AS deviceId, dev.device_name AS deviceName, dev.dev_desc AS deviceDesc, a.connect_state AS connStatus, a.online_state AS onlinStatus, b.default_tag AS defaultFlag, IFNULL(d.validTeaCount,0) AS reserveNum, a.client_ip_address AS ipAddress, dc.image_large AS deviceImg, a.province, a.city, a.district, a.address, dev.company_id AS companyId, cmp.company_name AS companyName, a.longitude, a.latitude FROM tb_device_state_info a INNER JOIN tb_user_device b ON a.device_id = b.device_id INNER JOIN tb_actived_device_info dev ON dev.device_id = a.device_id INNER JOIN tb_company cmp ON cmp.id = dev.company_id INNER JOIN t_data_vip c ON b.teaman_id = c.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN tb_device_color dc ON dev.device_type_id = dc.device_type_id LEFT JOIN (select count(1) validTeaCount,device_id FROM tb_user_book where valid_flag in (0,1) group by device_id) d ON d.device_id = a.device_id where c.PHONE = #{userMobile}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_actived_device_info set password = #{newPwd} where device_id = #{deviceId}
UPDATE tb_actived_device_info set device_name = #{deviceName}, dev_desc = #{deviceDesc} where device_id = #{deviceId}
UPDATE tb_actived_device_info set vol_flag = #{operFlag}, gms_flag = #{gmsFlag} where device_id = #{deviceId}
